'Acetonedicarboxylic acid' or '3-oxoglutaric acid' is a simple carboxylic acid,
which may be used as a building block in organic chemistry.

It is commercially available. [http://depatisnet.dpma.de/DepatisNet/depatis-
net?action=bibdat&docid=DE000000032245A German patent DE 32245 Farbwerke vormals
Meister, Lucius und BrÃ¼ning in HÃ¶chst a. M. (eingereicht 9. November 1884,
erteilt 9. July 1885)] It may also be prepared by decarbonylation of
citric acid in fuming sulfuric acid:
